problem: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线l_{1}、l_{2}与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F,若AB=2,AC=6,DE=1.5,则DF的长为()
comment: 本题考查了平行线分线段成比例:三条平行线截两条直线,所得的对应线段成比例．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight lines l_{N_0}、l_{N_1} and these three parallel lines intersect at points A, B, C and points D, E, F respectively, if AB=N_2,AC=N_3,DE=N_4, Then the length of DF is ()
